title: Soil, Compost, and Water Testing Enterprise
description: Experience in soil, compost, and water testing. Sampling rationale and protocol. Analyses of compost feedstocks and finished compost; monitoring for consistency. Theory and practice in use of analytical instrumentation. Interpretation of results for soil, compost, and water management. Total credit limited to 6 units for SS or ERSC majors. Total credit limited to 3 units for Soil Science minor.
prerequisites: CHEM 111, CHEM 125 or CHEM 128; SS 221; and junior standing
